attributes.action: let all perents know where pedaphiles are in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
perents have the right to know who is living in there street.
kids are the ones in most danger from pedaphiles.
we would like the law and govement to let us know what streets pedaphiles are living in in order for our kids to stay safe.

rejection.details: Please provide both your first and last name when submitting petitions.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
